ccre.saver

Class IgneousStorageProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.saver.StorageProvider
      • ccre.saver.IgneousStorageProvider

  • public class IgneousStorageProvider
extends StorageProvider
    A storage provider that works on Squawk and the FRC robot. This is because Java ME doesn't use the same interface as Java SE.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register()
        Ensure that this is registered as the storage provider. A warning will be logged if this is called a second time.

      • open

        protected StorageSegment open(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from class: StorageProvider
        Open a StorageSegment under the specific name. The name of a StorageSegment must contain only letters, numbers, currency symbols, and underscores.
        Specified by:
        open in class StorageProvider
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the storage segment.
        Returns:
        the StorageSegment that has been opened.
